text: Hello and welcome to another episode of Elephant English Podcast. In today's video we're going to be talking about technology and we're going to be following some speaking exam questions so that you can practice for your speaking exam and also you can improve your listening skills. So the first question is talk about how technology has changed in your lifetime.
